title: Great!!!!
review: I loved this movie. The story catches you and holds you until the very end. Tom Hanks is great as usual. The fact that it is a true story really makes it interesting. You really get involved with what's going in. I highly recommend it.

title: The worst!!!!!!!!!
review: I can't believe this picture has been nominated for Best Picture of the year. This was the most depressing and agonizing 2 1/2 hours I had ever spent watching a movie. It was hard to follow and even harder to get into the characters. Don't waste your time!!!!
